oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Handrawn map of Civil War Nashville and Fort Negley
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This detailed, two-sided, handrawn map includes many features of Civil War Nashville. Signed by "J.C." it shows downtown Nashville, incl. gun emplacements on river, the Brennan Foundry and the stockade and fortifications around the State Capitol. The reverse side shows sentry house and rifle pits on St. Cloud, Cathy's and Overtons Hills and military "graveyards" to the east, bisected by Chattanooga Railroad. Also shows "64-pounder" gun emplacements along the Cumberland River wharves and bridge.
